General.Name: Caxton
General.Description: Caxton and CTP Publishers and Printers Limited publishes and prints newspapers and magazines in South Africa. The company operates through Publishing, Printing and Distribution; and Packaging and Stationery segments. It engages in publishing and printing of newspapers and magazines, digital assets delivery, web and gravure printing, and book and digital printing, as well as manufacturing and distribution of labels, packaging, and stationery products. The company also engages in investment; CD and DVD replication; digital publishing; magazine distribution; and television channel development business. In addition, it offers digital and telecommunication solutions; and owns properties. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

1.Name: Mr. Timothy J. W. Holden BComm; CA(SA)
1.Title: MD, Financial Director & Exec. Director

2.Name: Mr. Leon  Witbooi M.B.A.
